billing_autorenew_service_update_manual_: You have selected manual renewal for your {{ serviceName }} service
With this renewal method, your service will not be renewed automatically when it reaches its expiry date.
You will be sent several email notifications in the weeks and days before the expiry date, and they will alert you regarding the expiry on {{ expiration }}.
You will simply need to renew your service if you want to keep using it.

Please note that once the service expires, it will be immediately suspended. It will no longer be accessible, and the data associated with the service will be permanently deleted within a few days if we do not receive any payment.
